/* ID : ARGOCOMMON.login */ SELECT CASE WHEN DATEADD(MONTH, CONVERT(int, '-'+ISNULL( (SELECT CASE VAL_CUR WHEN '' THEN '500' WHEN '0' THEN '500' ELSE VAL_CUR END VAL_CUR FROM TB_WAS_CONFIG WHERE SECTION = 'COMPANY' AND KEY_CODE = 'SITE_PWD_CHANGE'), '500')) , CONVERT(VARCHAR(10), GETDATE(),121)) > CONVERT(DATE,ISNULL(A.USER_PWD_UPT_DATE,'19900101')) THEN 'PWDCHG' WHEN (SELECT VAL_CUR FROM TB_WAS_CONFIG WHERE SECTION = 'COMPANY' AND KEY_CODE = 'INIT_PWD_CHANGE') = '1' AND (A.LOGIN_DATE IS NULL OR A.LOGIN_DATE = '') AND (A.USER_PWD_UPT_DATE IS NULL OR A.USER_PWD_UPT_DATE = '') THEN 'PWDCHG' WHEN ((SELECT USER_PWD FROM TB_MNG_USERINFO WHERE TENANT_ID ='bridgetec' AND USER_ID ='btadmin' ) = A.USER_PWD AND A.INS_ID = 'External') THEN 'PWDCHG' ELSE 'LOGINOK' END AS RESULT_CD , A.USER_ID AS AGENT_ID, A.TENANT_ID AS TENANT_ID, A.SALT,A.USER_PWD , CASE WHEN A.PLAYER_KIND = '' THEN '0' WHEN ISNULL(A.PLAYER_KIND,'') = '' THEN '0' ELSE A.PLAYER_KIND END AS PLAYER_KIND , CASE WHEN A.REAL_PLAY_KIND = '' THEN '0' WHEN ISNULL(A.REAL_PLAY_KIND,'') = '' THEN '0' ELSE A.REAL_PLAY_KIND END AS REAL_PLAY_KIND , A.USER_ID, A.GRANT_ID, A.USER_NAME, CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 8) AS LOGIN_TIME, CONVERT(CHAR(8), GETDATE(), 112) LOGIN_DATE , A.CONVERT_FLAG, A.BACKUP_FLAG, A.GROUP_ID , C.DEPTH , B.GRANT_NAME, B.AUTH_RANK , A.FORCED_LOGOUT, ISNULL(A.CONTROL_AUTH,'') CONTROL_AUTH, ISNULL(A.MAIN_PAGE,'') MAIN_PAGE , ISNULL(A.LOGIN_DATE_CHECK_USE,'') LOGIN_DATE_CHECK_USE , ISNULL(A.LOGIN_DATE_CHECK_FROM,'') LOGIN_DATE_CHECK_FROM , ISNULL(A.LOGIN_DATE_CHECK_TO,'') LOGIN_DATE_CHECK_TO , ISNULL(A.LOGIN_ERR_COUNT,0) LOGIN_ERR_COUNT , ISNULL((SELECT VAL_CUR FROM TB_WAS_CONFIG WHERE SECTION = 'COMPANY' AND KEY_CODE = 'SITE_PWD_FAIL_COUNT'), 0) SITE_PWD_FAIL_COUNT , ISNULL((SELECT VAL_CUR FROM TB_WAS_CONFIG WHERE SECTION = 'COMPANY' AND KEY_CODE = 'NOUSE_ACC_LOCK'), 0) AS NOUSE_ACC_LOCK , ISNULL(CONVERT(CHAR(8), A.LOGIN_DATE, 112), '') AS LAST_LOGIN_DATE FROM TB_MNG_USERINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MNG_AUTH B ON A.GRANT_ID = B.GRANT_ID AND A.TENANT_ID = B.TENANT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_MNG_GROUP C ON A.GROUP_ID = C.GROUP_ID AND A.TENANT_ID= C.TENANT_ID WHERE A.TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND A.USER_ID = #agentId# AND A.RETIREE_FLAG != 0
A.USER_PWD = #agentPw#

/* ID : ARGOCOMMON.getIntroUserInfo */ SELECT AGENT_STATUS, COUNT(*) CNT FROM ( SELECT CASE ISNULL(AGENT_STATUS,'') WHEN NULL THEN '00' WHEN '' THEN '00' ELSE AGENT_STATUS END AGENT_STATUS FROM TB_MNG_USERINFO WHERE TENANT_ID = #tenantId# AND RETIREE_FLAG = '1' ) T GROUP BY AGENT_STATUS

/* ID : ARGOCOMMON.getIntroRecCntList */ select '당일('+rec_date+')' as rec_date, isnull(sum_cnt_m1,0) sum_cnt_m1, isnull(time_avg_m1,0) time_avg_m1 from ( select CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, 0, getdate()),112) rec_date ) t_d left outer join ( select CONVERT(varchar,getdate(),112) rdate_m1, count(1) sum_cnt_m1, ROUND(avg(end_time),1) time_avg_m1 from TB_REC_FILE where tenant_id = #tenantId# and rec_time > CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, 0, getdate()),112) and rec_time < CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, 0, getdate()),112)+'99' and SEARCH_VISIBLE = 1 group by datepart(dw, left(rec_time,8)) ) tm1 on rec_date = rdate_m1 union all select '전일('+rec_date+')' as rec_date, isnull(sum_cnt_m1,0) sum_cnt_m1, isnull(time_avg_m1,0) time_avg_m1 from ( select CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, -1, getdate()),112) rec_date ) td1 left outer join ( select CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, -1, getdate()),112) rdate_d1, sum(rec_count) sum_cnt_m1, round(avg(end_time_avg),0) time_avg_m1 from TB_REC_FILE_DAY where tenant_id = #tenantId# and rec_time > CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, -1, getdate()),112) and rec_time < CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, -1, getdate()),112)+'99' group by datepart(dw, left(rec_time,8)) ) tm2 on rec_date = rdate_d1 union all select '전주('+rec_date+')' as rec_date, isnull(sum_cnt_m1,0) sum_cnt_m1, isnull(time_avg_m1,0) time_avg_m1 from ( select CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, -7, getdate()),112) rec_date ) td1 left outer join ( select CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, -7, getdate()),112) rdate_d1, sum(rec_count) sum_cnt_m1, ROUND(avg(end_time_avg),0) time_avg_m1 from TB_REC_FILE_DAY where tenant_id = #tenantId# and rec_time > CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, -7, getdate()),112) and rec_time < CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(D, -7, getdate()),112) + '99' group by datepart(dw, left(rec_time,8)) ) tm2 on rec_date = rdate_d1 union all select '전달('+rec_date+')' as rec_date, isnull(sum_cnt_m1,0) sum_cnt_m1, isnull(time_avg_m1,0) time_avg_m1 from ( select CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(M, -1, getdate()),112) rec_date ) td1 left outer join ( select CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(M, -1, getdate()),112) rdate_d1, sum(rec_count) sum_cnt_m1, ROUND(avg(end_time_avg),0) time_avg_m1 from TB_REC_FILE_DAY where tenant_id = #tenantId# and rec_time > CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(M, -1, getdate()),112) and rec_time < CONVERT(varchar,DATEADD(M, -1, getdate()),112) + '99' group by datepart(dw, left(rec_time,8)) ) tm2 on rec_date = rdate_d1

/* ID : ARGOCOMMON.getIntroRecentList */ SELECT REC_TIME, SUM(REC_COUNT) REC_COUNT, ROUND(AVG(REC_COUNT),0) REC_AVG FROM ( SELECT LEFT(REC_TIME,8) REC_TIME, USER_ID, SUM(REC_COUNT) REC_COUNT FROM TB_REC_FILE_DAY WHERE REC_TIME > CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE()-14, 112) AND TENANT_ID = #tenantId# GROUP BY LEFT(REC_TIME,8), USER_ID ) T_S GROUP BY REC_TIME ORDER BY REC_TIME
/* ID : ARGOCOMMON.logoutCheck */ SELECT RTRIM(CAST(forced_logout AS CHAR(10))) as forced_logout FROM TB_MNG_USERINFO WHERE TENANT_ID = #logoutTenantId# AND USER_ID = #logoutAgentId#

/* ID :ARGOCOMMON.grantForm */ select A.AUTH_KIND from tb_mng_menuauth A, tb_mng_menu B WHERE A.tenant_id ='$TID$' and A.grant_id='$GID$' and A.DEPTH1_ID=B.DEPTH1_ID AND A.DEPTH2_ID = B.DEPTH2_ID AND A.DEPTH3_ID = B.DEPTH3_ID AND B.SRC_DO='$URL$'
